alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 22 at 2:49AM PST until January 22 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog with some locations down to 200 feet. * WHERE...Central and southern San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways impacted include, but are not limited to 99, 198, 43, 41, 190, 152, and 46.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
